column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////From my multiple visits I've pretty much had their entire menu
column2: minus the paella. Â I would say on average all the tapas are above average
column3: but the stand outs are the patatas bravas
column6: and the garlic shrimp. This place definitely gets super busy so make sure either make a reservation or fend for yourself at the bar. Overall
column7: a nice place to get social
